vote.title: Authorize a letter amendment to the Lease Agreement between the City of Dallas and the Arena Group to grant the request by the Center Operating Company, L.P. for a one-time deferment of the October 1, 2020 rent payment for the American Airlines Center in the amount of $3,400,000.00 until April 30, 2021 - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
